captions.text: You!
Is it terrorist attack?

Where are they attacking from?
Oh, it is raining.

Why is the TV on
at such late hour?

Is Ragini MMS 3 being shown
on TV at such late hour?
What are you watching?

Looks like Sunny Leone is
about to come out of the screen.
He slept without having medicine.
Here, have medicine.

Get up.
Have medicine and sleep.
I'm telling for your betterment.
Sleep. It's already 3 AM.
Mr. Arvind. - Yes.
Come on, get up.
Sorry.
Come.

How are you, Arvind?
Are you okay?
What do I say, doctor?

Neither he says anything
or does anything.
Sits quietly in a corner.

He suddenly wakes up
in the middle of the night..

..starts staring at the TV
and photo..
..and then goes to sleep.
You just don't worry, Gopal.

Tell me one thing, Arvind. For how
long do you keep staring at them?
He won't say that easily.

Doctor is asking something.
Answer him.
Gopal. let him speak.
What happened?

All the patients have gone.
Shall I also go home?

Okay. You can go.
- Thank you, sir.
Gopal, do you have cigarette?
Yes, there must be 1 or 2 left.

Doctor, he doesn't get sleep.
He refuses to take sleeping pill.

He gets angry for everything.
Here, take it.

Arvind, why is your brother
complaining so much about you?

Hasn't your anger still
not come under control?

Why shouldn't I get angry?
Why should I forget old memories?

Is it possible by you?
- Leave me.
Then why should I forget?

Gopal,
I don't agree with you completely.
I still remember Arvind in rage.
Like a wild animal.

Right, Arvind?
Your brother is lying, isn't it?
What's the matter, Arvind?
What are you looking for?

Doctor, after smoking cigarette
I had kept it in the ashtray..
I had only two cigarettes.

I'm smoking one and
doctor took the other.

I gave you cigarette,
but you didn't take it.
Then how can you smoke cigarette?
Memory slip.

You still remember the things
you did in the past. - No, doctor.

Well, the taste of nicotine
is on my tongue.
I did smoke cigarette.
What is he..?
Don't worry, Gopal.

Because of the head injury,
there will often be such problems.

The smell of the cigarette we're
smoking has gone into his mind.

Therefore he feels that he has
smoked cigarette himself. That's it.

Nothing to fear, Gopal.
Everything will be normal gradually.

Arvind,
you must keep yourself busy.
Why don't you rejoin your work?

He will work only if he steps out
of the house. - At least try.

Sir?
You've come early today?
Have you started going back to work?
That's good. God bless you.

Thank you, guys.
That's it for the day.

Awesome, guys.
- Thank you, sir.

Sir, it was fun.
- I'm almost reaching.

Anjali, I'm going
to office straight. - Okay.

See you, bye. - Wait.
Even I'm coming. - Come fast.
Hey, wait.
Excuse me. - Yes.
Well, your zip.
Zip is shut.
Hey, hello.

Madam, I guess you didn't close
the zip of your bag.

My young friends, I welcome you all
on behalf of Paayal Info Tech.

On this special occasion, I wish
to share something with you all.

Paayal Info Tech
is a unique company.
Thanks.
Sorry. And thanks.
As you all know..
Arvind. You forgot this.
Thanks. - What's this?

Look,
there are 168 missed on my phone.

And you also didn't
come to office yesterday.
Do you have fever?

There's client presentation in
the office today. Do you remember?

Tell me something.
You don't like it in office, right?
Shall we go now?

If you are here for donation
then please go away.
Do you think I'm here for donation?
You also look like a beggar.
I look like a beggar?
For your kind information..

..I spend this much money
in one day in the dance bar.

This is not dance bar.
What brings you here?
You give connection, right?

Which connection do you want?
- Any connection. It should be fun.
Fun?
Entertainment.
Got it?

I'm talking to you,
why are you throwing the key?

Because I have
many vacant bungalows.

Do you keep your wife
in her mother's house?

Tell me to which bungalow
should I deliver the stuff?
I will tell you.

You know Rangralia Cottage in Gorai,
don't you? = Yes.

There is a bungalow beside it.
- I see.
I take girls there to have fun.

Give me the stuff.
What are you waiting for?

Tell me something.
What kind of a girl you want?

First preference,
she should be a model.
Even an athlete will do.

Keep one thing in mind. She
shouldn't even 1 month more than 19.
I understood your requirement.
You need a young 19 year old girl..

..with whom you can connect.
- Yes.

First preference,
she should be a model.
Even an athlete will do.
Am I right? - Yes.
I will get you one. Come close.
Why did you break my nose?

If not 19 then even
40 years old woman will do.

Actually, my wife left me
because of my lowly character.
Therefore, I develop desires.
I heard you do connections.

Connect girls to men.
- I connect cables.
You took me to be a pimp.

'The number you have called
is currently unavailable.'

Where is the photo?
- Which photo?

Where is Liyana's photo?
What did you do with it?
Have you lost your mind?

You think I will forget her
if you change the photo?
This is how it always was.
You also lie to me?
I will kill you.
Give Liyana's photo back to me.

Who Liyana? It is my photo
and you keep staring at it every day.
Why isn't the video playing?
Oh God.
You erased Liyana's memories.

I will erase every thought
of Liyana's from him mind.

I will turn him
into a living corpse.
Nikhil!
Nikhil. - Sir.
Don't spare him. - Okay.
He snatched my Paayal.

I will show him
the pain of losing love.

I will make him cry.
I will make him suffer.
I will make him crave like me.

I want it back, doctor.
My Liyana's photo.

The DVD in which
she is seen smiling.

Arvind, it's been nine months
for your accident.

I think I will have to
tell the truth.
You said you had a girlfriend.

And she is studying
in some college of the city.

This is the student list
of that college.

There is no girl
by the name Liyana in this batch.
And this is census report.

The girl who you told me
about doesn't live here.
Have a look yourself.
What are you trying to say?

Liyana whom you say
is your girlfriend..
..is an illusion not real.

God, I'm about to express
my feelings to her.
Please give me the courage.
I want to say something to you.

Look, I've been wanting
to say this to you.
But I was scared.

And today, I prayed
in the church and somehow..

..gathered courage and
what I'm about to say..
..well..

It is you and your brother
in this photograph.

And if you feel it is not him,
but a girl in it..

..then it is your illusion.
We call it paralisia.

What you see in the DVD,
it is because of the same reason.

Of course, may be you read
or heard about Liyana..

..or maybe you met her
in some other birth.

After the accident,
your mind is not in your control.

In your memory, some girl
looks like your girlfriend.

When we were smoking
cigarette the other day..

..you felt as if
even you were smoking.

Similarly, even this girl
is just your illusion.

It is because of my
successful treatment you're seeing..

..your brother instead
of that girl in the photograph.
And that's the fact.
You will now be fine, Arvind.
Do you also feel the same?

This doctor doesn't know anything
about me. He is rubbishing.

You know her.
Haven't you seen her?

Haven't you seen her?
- Stop it, Arvind.

Not just your brother, no one
in this world has ever seen her.

How can anyone see
the image on your mind?
Doctor. You are out of your mind.

Are the 15 days which I spent
with Liyana an illusion to you?
An imagination?
I'm not mad. I will prove it.

Look at this scar, look at the wound
on my lips. Are they not real?
There was no chance to survive.
Liyana's head was bleeding.

She got killed.
She got killed right before me.

Arvind, it is true that
you had a car accident.

And it is also true
that you suffered injuries.
And you were alone in the car.

Come here, doctor.
Please come.

Gopal, even you come.
Come, doctor.
Look. I brought you to show this.

Have a good look.
What do you have to say about this?

Tell me, doctor.
Gopal, you tell me.

If Liyana was killed
in the accident that day then her..
Doctor, believe me.

I'm not lying.
This is Liyana's grave.
Doctor, just a minute.
Gopal, I'm telling the truth.
This is Liyana's grave. - Arvind.

This is my Liyana's grave.
Believe me, doctor.
This.. oh, my God.
Arvind. Stop it, Arvind.
Uncle. Just a minute.
Uncle, come here.

What is this?
Where is my Liyana's grave?

What are you saying? You come
every day to put flowers on the grave.
Look, the candle that you had lit.

How dare you lie?
My Liyana's grave was here.
What are you doing?
Arvind.
Doctor, as per his imagination..

..his girlfriend died
in a car accident.
We won't tell him the truth.

Otherwise,
his condition will worsen.
No Gopal, it is a good sign.

He has to agree that Liyana
was only his illusion and not real.

Don't you wish that even
your brother lives a normal life?
Liyana.
Hey.
Where is my mobile?

I'll give you, sir.
- Come on, give it.
Take it.
Run away. Get away.

I took out the phone to call,
but he snatched it from my hand.
Who? He?

Yes. I wouldn't be able to
nab the thief without this remote.
Remote? - Yes, it is a remote.

The remote belongs to the mall,
but you are getting worried. - Wait.

The thing which you threw taking
it to be a remote was my cell phone.
Is it a cell phone? - Yes.
My latest mobile.

If this is mobile then
what is the thing that I have?

Hello. I'll lose my contacts.
What are you doing? - Your SIM card.

You were acting too smart.
Fix my mobile and then take yours.
Excuse me.
Give me your number. - Why?
Don't you want the compass box back?
Who are you?

I want a new cable connection.
- Sure. I do it every day.
Your address?
Well.. - One second.

Tell me, Arvind. - Gopal, there's
an urgent work. Where are you?
What work?

Come here. - I can't.
There is a new connection.
I think he will ruin everything.
Tell me the address? - Hello?
He hung up?

If you switch off the phone,
you think you can get away?

What kind of a
cable operator is you?
The cable doesn't work properly.
The next time you come for money..

..I will thrash you.
I will break your leg.
Idiot. I'm not able to watch ABCL.
Arvind!

What was the need for you
to switch off the booster?
All the customers are abusing me.

Tell me whose address
are you searching? It is a girl?

What was the need to give
mobile number to a stranger, Liyana?

Aunt, I gave the number
only this morning.
If he was a troublesome guy..

..he would've called several times
by now. - Listen, Liyana.

Change your number
tomorrow morning. - Relax, aunt.

Alright. I will use this number
until I get my phone back.

Your problem is you take
everyone to be good.

I found her address
with great difficulty.
This is her house. - Great.
I will go inside and fix the cable..

..and you woo the girl.
- Let's go.

Do you know where to go?
- No.

Go to the girl's room straight
and pretend to fix the cable.

What if there is
no TV in her room?

I will pick the TV from the hall,
take it to her room and fix it.

Alright. Don't make me nervous.
- Let's go.
Hey. - Yes.
Why isn't it opening?

It isn't a pant fly to open easily.
There's nobody home.
We are safe now. Let's go.

Wait a minute.
I will think of an idea.

Wait right here.
- Wait a minute. Listen to me.
Oh no.
Run. Hurry. They are back.
Hurry.
I only fix cables.

I wonder what else
will he make me do.
He ran away just for horn sound.

If she had come in the front,
what he would've done?

He ran away,
but left me behind to get thrashed.
Hello.
Reminder alarm, visa interview?
Oh. I hope he remembers.
Seems to be a good guy.

You never do yoga
or meditation yourself.

Why are you disturbing
the one who is doing?

Stop smoking cigarette
and answer the phone. - Yes.
Hello. - Who is this?
I'm Liyana. The mobile.. - Hello.

It'll take four days to fix your
mobile. - That's not the matter.
Today's your Canada visa interview.

There was a reminder in the phone,
hence I called. - Thanks.
Thanks a lot. - You are welcome.

Anything else? - Nothing. I'm sorry.
I disturbed you when doing veneration.

Veneration?
- Weren't you performing veneration?

I felt really good hearing
chants in your caller tune.

I thought you were
performing veneration.

I was not performing veneration.
I was doing yoga.

You were doing yoga?
Do you know yoga?

Arvind, does yoga help
memory become strong?

I don't remember
anything when studying.

Not just memory power,
it also increases many powers.
What?

What do you mean 'many powers'?
- I will tell you.

There is a special power
in every human being.
You too. - Is it?

I.. once I see a picture,
I can draw it same to same.

By the way,
what power do you posses?

I? Promise me you won't
tell anybody. - Okay.

Are you at home now?
- Yes, I'm in my room.

Are there four black and
white pillows on the bed?
How do you know?

The wall in the east,
your painting is hung on it.
Am I right?

How do you know?
- That's my power.
One minute.

So far, you said
everything correctly. - So?

So, there is a mobile number
on the calendar. Tell the number.
And the last two numbers are 56.

How is it possible, Arvind.
It is the cable guy's number.
That's the power of yoga.
Wow. I just can't believe.
I will talk to you later. - Hello.
Actually aunt..

..there was a remainder,
so I called to inform him.

Sorry, aunt.
- It shouldn't happen again.
Okay.

Aunt, he was telling
my room details from his house.
What are you saying?

Someone said something
and you believed?

He definitely has some power.
There's something.

How can I tell her
'I love you' just like that?

If you don't say it today,
someone else will woo her.

And you will just see her
getting married away.

Gopal,
we became friends just recently.

I'm afraid what will happen
if she rejects my proposal.
Alright. Listen to me.
Present her such a gift..

..that she can't hide it
from the world.

She herself will tell the world
that you her husband.
Be serious at least sometimes.
Tell me what do I do?

Have I opened a free advise centre?
How can..? - This is the place.

This is the place where
I was walking with him.
Tell the truth.
Gopal, don't lie.

Didn't you come to
Liyana's house with me?

The house you are talking about,
you yourself took me there.

We don't supply cable connection
there past five years.
Yes, we used to go there.
But there was never a girl like her.

What happened? You don't believe me?
You want to check for yourself?
Liyana is dead.
How can she be there?

I see. She won't be there.
But you said her aunt lives there.
She will be there. Take us to her.

No..
- Why are you hesitating so much?

Doctor, after Liyana's death,
I had been there.

But people who live there
said her aunt left the city.

One person left the city
and the other died.

Tell us something
which we can believe.
No.
No.

Look, for you,
Liyana may be my illusion.
But she is my girlfriend.
She lives in this world.
She is still alive inside me.

Look Gopal, I want the photo
and DVD in one hour.

Otherwise,
the consequences will be dire.

It is not right to leave him alone.
Come on.
He went that way, doctor.
Hey!
Stop!
Stop!
Stop!
How are you?
Doctor. - Leave me.

I said leave me.
I don't know who you are. - Arvind.
Arvind. leave her. - Leave me.
Take a good look at me. - Leave me.

You're lying. - Is this the way
you behave with a girl?
What are you doing?
What are you doing?

Doctor, she is the one
I was talking about. - Calm down.
She is the one. She is Liyana's aunt.

She.. why are you lying?
- What's going on? Please Go.
How dare you?

Wait. I'll call the police
right away. Wait a minute.
Madam, please. - Stop it, madam.
Madam, I'm his brother.

Please. - Stop it. She is her aunt.
- Be quiet.
Madam, don't misunderstand me.
You really don't know him?

Hey, who are you?
And what do you want?

Excuse me. What's your name?
- Who are you?
Psychiatrist. And he?
He is my patient.

Sorry. It is not right to leave
mad people like him on the streets.
Keep my card. - Hey.

How dare you call me mad?
- Stop it. Do you know her?

Yes, she is Liyana's aunt
I told you about.
Then tell her name. - Her name..
Name. - Sorry madam, please go.
She is going. Don't let..
All of you are betraying me.
How dare you say that?

Why will I betray you?
Is that my job?

I'm a doctor and I have
great respect in the society.

You have crossed
the limit of shamelessness.

Gopal, I'm sorry.
Find another doctor for him.
Doctor. Doctor, please.
Arvind.. - Get away.
"Separation."
"Separation."

How much is your salary?
- No, thanks.
Uncle.. - Father.
Is there tax for laughing?
The number does exist.

But what is the name of the person?
- Liyana.
It is not registered in that name.
Check properly. - Arvind.
His name is Arvind?

The number is registered
in his name. Look.
How is possible?

What are you doing?
- How is possible? - Arvind, stop.
You are betraying.

There is nothing
written about Liyana?
Arvind.
Arvind, what happened?
No.

Something is wrong.
I'm not able to understand anything.
Please.
Please.
Arvind.
Stop.
Arvind!

'Once I see a picture,
I can draw it same to same.'
Oh God. It's wonderful, isn't it?
Before she calls me again..

..and ask me more questions
about yoga, please teach me yoga.

Guru, I'm handing over
my ignorant brother to you.
For him to impress that girl..
..teach him such yoga..

..that even Ramdev Baba
runs away getting embarrassed.

Not only in this birth,
but even in many births to come..

..both of you won't learn yoga.
If you did, I will change my name.
Aunt. - Yes.
Your beloved husband..
..is refusing to teach yoga.

Tell him to agree, otherwise
he'll face dire consequences.
Dear, teach them.
Brother.

From today, he is your guru
and you're his student.
All of you join your hands first.
Hold the position. - Guru.

What happened to him?
- What happened?
Did master die teaching yoga?
What happened? Open your eyes.
Gopal, give him the key.

He was already weak.
This was bound to happen.
Why did you come to learn yoga?

Your one question brought him
to this condition. - What question?

Get up. - Which question
brought him to that condition?
Just a normal question.
I want to impress Liyana.
So I asked guru..
..if yoga can help me walk on water.

Did you want to go from India
to Sri Lanka walking on the water?
It is not your fault?

She thinks you posses some power,
it is her fault.

How can you lie
to such an innocent girl?

Hello. - Who is disturbing
at such early hour?

It's Liyana. - Don't you know
I'll be doing yoga at this time?

Sorry. I indeed wanted
to ask you about yoga.
Your power.. - Power?

Nobody gets any power doing yoga.
- Did you tell anyone about it?

Yes, I told my aunt
out of excitement.

Sorry. - Whether or not people
believe, doesn't really matter.

I know I have power in me.
You want to say anything else?

Nothing.
Alright, I'll hang up. Bye, Arvind.

You can't hung up.
Your aunt insulted me.
She insulted my power.

Put the phone on speaker.
- There is no speaker in my phone.

Hello. Did you forget?
You have my phone.

You've given your phone for repair.
Turn on the speaker now.
And sit in Padmaasan now.
Padma? - Padmaasan.
Fold your legs and sit.
Okay. - Did you sit?
Now, close your eyes. - Okay.

Now, I'm about to keep
my hands on yours. - What?
Just imagine.
Okay. - Okay?

Now, I'm about to transfer
my power to you from here.
Really?

Now, open your eyes slowly.
Is the TV on?
Yes.
Take a good look at it now.

From the bottom of your soul,
tell the TV to go off.
TV, go off.
Now, tell it to turn on.
Say it.
Turn on.
Once more time.
Okay. For you.
Turn on.
Go off.
On.
Off. On. Off.
On.
"When I saw you.."
It is amazing, Arvind.
I will talk later. - Bye.

Go off.
- Kantilal Godbole from Kishan Ganj.
Go off.

Go off.
- Social Networking from anywhere.
Go off.

It went off.
- What are you doing, Liyana?

I turned off the TV. And you are
blabbering in front of the TV?
Nothing, aunt.
Liya. - Yes.
He had phoned, right? - No.
Liyana, I trust you..

..that you won't hide anything
from your aunt.
Hereafter, if Liyana meets Arvind..
..or if she tries to meet him..

..before killing her,
I will kill you.

You cheat your customers
and feed dog?

Are you taking the dog for a walk
or is the dog taking you for a walk?

Shut up. My dog is not Indian,
but imported.

So what if it is imported.
Doesn't it do it by lifting its leg?
It only does what I say.
I spent 25 dollars for its training.
25 dollars for a dog? - Yes.

What kind of training is that?
- You want to see?
Lakkan, catch beer.

Superb.
You see my dog is American.

Yours is Indian
and it can only bark.
Really? Now, look at my training.
Sunny, bring beer.

I trained it.
Put the cork in your mouth.

Sunny, I will finish the beer,
until then don't let him go.

Hi Liyana, when will you meet me?
Haven't met you for long time.
I'll call back.
Hello. Tell me, Liya.

Arvind, I saw you
on the escalator just now.
But you disappeared all of a sudden.

She must've seen somebody else.
- Hello?
Arvind? You're in which floor?
Even I'm in Spectrum Mall.
Really? Me too. What's the matter?
Actually, I wanted to know..

To which service centre
did you give my mobile?
I will collect it myself.

And I will also give
your mobile to the same centre.
Any problem?

My aunt doesn't like
me talking to you.
I'm forced to lie to her.
So, we will have to stop it.
Hello? Arvind?
Hello? Arvind?
The mobile is ready. It is with me.

Actually, I'm busy in a meeting.
- Hello. - Hello, sir.

Wait for some time.
I will come and give it to you.
Okay. I will wait for 20 minutes.

Spectrum Mall
is 7 kms away from here.

I also have to take the mobile.
Got to do something.

I fixed your mobile long back,
you are coming now?
Sorry. I had forgotten.
Arvind, the meeting is not over yet?

It's over.
I'm waiting for you in the mall.
I was about to leave..
Hello. Liyana, where are you?
You have the power. So find me.
Again.

She keeps testing
my power all the time.
How do you do that?
Actually, I.. - Wow.
Power. - That's great.
My mobile.

I'll give you mobile
only on one condition.

You have to join me
for a coffee.
Why? - To recharge my power.
Here.

Here's your mobile.
- Thanks.
Excuse me.
I joined the college recently.
My seniors are ragging.
He's told me to touch you.
Hello?
Not here, here!
Show me what happened today.
You won't believe it.
Hey, who are you?
Leave him. - Leave him.

Arvind, let it be.
- Come on.
Arvind, leave him.
Arvind!
Sir, sorry!
Sir..
Sir!

Sir, please don't hit me.
- Leave him.
Run from here!
Hey!
I'm sorry, actually..
Hey!
Hey, I won't hit you.

Tell me something.
Look at me.

Who is he?
- It is you.
Who is next to me?
One girl. There's a girl.
Yes, she..
What's written in the corner?
Liyana.. Liyana.

Then why did my
brother lie to me?
Why is doctor hiding the truth?

What's going on?
Why are they doing this?
Who sent you?

Tell me who sent you
or I'll kill you. - Edwin boss.
Edwin boss sent me here.
Edwin, who are you?
Come out!
Hey, step out of the car.

Edwin, if you have guts
come in front of me.
Come on, you!

Nikhil sir, that scoundrel
told him my name.
So what? Go and kill him. Go!
Hey!
No!
Gopal!
Gopal!
I lied to you till now.
Because, I want you to live.
I.. forgive me.
Gopal!
Hey!

What? You are
going to Canada?
Who'll cook food for me?

But such girl
didn't exist at all.
Do you think I'll forget her?

Hey, it was like this
since before.

You are not at fault. It is her
fault as she thinks you're powerful.
Forgive me.
What's your name?

Answer me, I'm asking you.
What's your name?

Where do you stay?
Do you recognize him?

I'm asking you.
Are you deaf? Come on!
Sir, he's not saying anything.

You try,
he may reveal something.
Hey.
Sorry.
Nab him!

Greetings, Dr. Anand has
gone abroad for a conference.

So, the clinic will be
closed for few days.
Sorry for the inconvenience.
Go and see if he's inside.
Listen, he shouldn't escape.

But it is not good to leave
crazy people on roads.
This is my card.

'This number can't be
reached right now.'
'Please, try later.'

'This number can't be
reached right now.'
'Please, try later.'
What's the matter?
Sir, it is switched off.
Try again.

I'm telling you to try again.
Turn on the speaker.

But the phone is switched off.
- Do as I say, come on!
'Who am I going marry?'
'Who am I going marry?'

'Finding husband for oneself is the
most important decision of life.'

Liyana asked such weird
question to me so easily.

She was sure that I have
some power in me.

That day when I was to answer
her, I was scared.
I was feeling restless.

I was really..
really scared that day.

Bro, you don't worry.
There'll be fun in today's party.

Come on, let me introduce you
to my younger brother.
Say 'Hi' to him.
Don't act, come on.
What should I answer her?
I feel like committing suicide.

If anybody could die for
answering someone..

..then we both would've died
in 1st standard.
Here, have it.
Have it.

You are talking rubbish.
- Are you out of your mind?
Hi. - Hi.
Kulfi? - No.

My liquor is waiting
for me. - Get lost!
How did it get locked?
'I feel like committing suicide.'

Arvind, brother!
Don't do suicide!
Arvind, open the door!

What's this?
He's enjoying sitting alone.
Arvind? He drank half bottle.
Arvind, leave some for me.
Listen, enough.

Keep some for me.
Listen, come out.
I paid for the liquor.

What are you doing?
I paid for the liquor.

Keep some for me.
At least a little.

One glass, half..
Give me some thing.
Hey Gopal..

Good you remembered my name
after drinking half the bottle.

Careful, you fall, but don't
drop the bottle.
Careful.
Get up holding the wall.

I'll die of thirst until
you come out.
I have to do something.
Hey, pour some liquor in it.

Here, don't drop it down.
Be careful.
This way. What are you doing?

Pour it. Why are you moving
your hand? - Hold it properly.
Pour liquor in it.
Give me the bottle.
Wow.
Who pulled my liquor bottle?

What harm would it do to you,
had you given me some liquor?
Are you happy now?
Look, I'm going to Canada today.
I won't return for two years.

When I used my power to
see your future..

..I learnt who your
husband will be.

I'm telling you just because
you had asked me.
Who?

Your would-be husband..
It is me.
Liya..
Liya..
Say something before you leave.
Can you drop me home?
Keep it inside.

This number can't be
reached right now.

Please try again..
- Sir, shall we leave?
Yes, one minute.
Sir, shall we?

Hey, did I book the taxi
to load the luggage?
Let my brother come.
Idiot.
Tell me.

Bro, time for the flight.
I'm waiting for you at home.

I'll come to the airport directly.
You come there with the luggage.

Did you tell her?
- I shall hang up now.

Did you tell her?
- Yes, I did!

I'm waiting for the answer.
Hang up the phone now.

"Whether you say yes or no,
you are my Kiran."
Liya..

You told me to take you
to the airport..
I'm waiting.
Liyana..
Who is he?
Tell me.
Aunt.. - Who is he?
He's my..
I.. I'm in love.
He proposed me.
What do I do now?

After my parents' death,
you mean everything to me.

If you agree, only then
I will give my consent.

So, I came here
without answering.
He's leaving for Canada today.

Before he leaves,
I have to answer him.
I need your permission.

Isn't he the same Arvind who had
told you that he has..

..the power of seeing invisible
things? Isn't he the one?

Aunt, I don't know why you
don't believe him.

How do I believe and
who do I believe?
You want permission?

You fell in love with him
because of his powers?

Aunt, I like Arvind.
This is the only reason.
But the fact is..

..I am sure he has some
special power in him.

I've been trying to explain you,
still you think he has powers?
Sorry.
I'm so sorry, aunt.
No, this is your life.
You have to decide it.

I don't want anyone to take
advantage of your innocence.
So, I..

Liyana, you want to give him
a gift before he leaves, right?
No.

We'll put this showpiece in the
box and gift wrap it.

We'll see if he'll be able
to tell it or not.
If he tells.. - What if he does?

Then I'll make the arrangements
of your wedding.

He will easily tell it.
Aunt!
You pack this, I'll be back.
Liyana, come soon.
Yes. - Arvind is honking.
Sorry, wait for some more time.
Then, I'm all yours.

Aunt, I think he's getting
late for the flight.
One minute.

Aunt, why did you call me?
- Yes, I called.

You go, but don't
disconnect the phone.

Whatever you talk,
I want to hear that.

I believe you, but I will
believe him only when..

..he will be able to tell what
is in this box.
We'll bypass there.
Close your eyes.
Is it time to play?

I know, this is not
the time to play.

But it is very
important for both of us.
Only for five minutes..

..please, close your eyes
for five minutes.

I just want to tell me
what is in this box.
Can't you do this for me?
I'm tensed as I'm getting late.
I am even more tensed.

Please, Arvind.
Please.

You didn't answer my question
I asked you a while back.

So, answer me..
- Arvind, please tell me.
Tell me.
I will answer.

Only when you tell me
what is inside this.
So, please.
I will tell you on the way.

'I've always been able to answer
all the questions till now.'

'But when I proposed her today,
she is not agreeing.'
'Arvind, you got caught.'

'If I guess right
what's in the box..
..then she'll marry you.'
'What could be in the box?'

'When I picked the box,
it was very light.'
'It will contain..'
Who selected this gift?

Did you select it or
your friend? I mean..

Look, if I don't ask you,
my power..

My inner power and
cosmic power..
What could be in it?
Arvind, concentrate.
What could be in it?

Perfume, watch, or
her father's souvenir.
What is in it?

Oh God, who brought this
box in between love?
I see, the mobile is on.
Aunt is on line.
This means, she is hearing us.
This is not Liayana's test.
Aunt is testing me.
Think..
Come on.
What could be in it?

She doesn't like me,
but she still played this game.

What has she got
to do with the gift?

When I left from home,
there was a sarcastic smile..
..on her face.
There's something fishy.
I think aunt packed this gift.
Yes, she has packed it.
What she would've kept in this?
Come on, guess it.

When I reached home,
she was staring at me.

When I moved,
still she was staring at me.
But there was something missing.

The thing that was missing
must be in this box.
What was it?

Come on, Arvind. - Wait,
don't disturb me. Just wait.
'She was standing upstairs..
..she was wearing..

..a chain in her neck and
when I moved..

..she was not wearing it.
This means, yes! Yes!

555 chain!
This contains 555 chain!

Arvind.. - Yes, this contains
aunt's chain in it.

Please, think about it again.
- I'm 100% sure, Liya.
This is important for me too.
Come on!
Hurry up. What is in it?
What is in it?
Tell me, Liya.
Please, tell me.
Liya..
No.
Liya..
Liya?
Wake up. Liya!
Liya?
Who parked the car here?
Leave me. Let me go.
Let me go or..
Don't you know me?

You don't know me?
Haven't you met me before?

Tell me do you
know me or not?
Tell me, who am I?

Tell me my name.
- Arvind!

I had come to Mumbai
for an interview.
I met Edwin there.
He is dark.

He wears a ring in his ears.
Isn't he the one?
Yes, Edwin got me a job.
I had to adopt a girl..

..and educate her nicely.
This was my job.
Yes, she was Liyana.

His condition was that she shouldn't
fall in love when in college.
He even instructed me that..

..Liyana should never do
who is doing this.
He had many conditions.

Liyana's college life for
four years was very good.
But I never expected..

..that she would come
so close to you.
When I told Edwin..
..about you both, he..

Hereafter, if Liyana
meets Arvind..
..or even tries to meet her..

..then I will kill you
before I kill her.
Then I came to my hometown.
I joined in my father's old job.

I had been to Mumbai
for an official visit.

I was going in my friend's car
and you saw me.
You asked me about Liyana.

Then I understood,
there is some problem.

If I reveal the truth,
Edwin's men will kill me.

So, I didn't recognize you.
- Where does he live?

I don't know,
he comes and meets me.

Give him his number. - He calls me
from a different number each time.
Last, he called from this number.
'Is currently switched off.'
Arvind, Edwin is not alone.
Many people are behind him.
Why would they adopt Liyana?
Why would they educate her?

Why would they give her
so luxurious life?
I don't know anything.

I just know that there's
a big conspiracy behind this.

Because of Liyana's
death in the accident..
..I feel, their plan got ruined.
I told you what I knew.
Please, let me go.
Arvind..
Thanks.
You take care of yourself.
They can do anything.
Anjali..

Arvind.. - Please,
don't call out my name.

Do this, leave that
place immediately.
Patil, tell me.

Sir, the girl's phone that
we were tapping..

..she got a call from unknown
number 2 minutes ago.
Okay, what did they talk?
Where were you?
It's been so many days.
You didn't even call me.
What do you think of me?

I can't take help
from the police.
But I have to find them.

Once if I find them, I will
kill all of them.
I'm scared.

Arvind, I need you.
- Don't act.
They are not coming before me.

They are attacking me
from behind.

I don't know why
they are doing so.
But I can't take it anymore.
Arvind, will you leave me?
No.
How can I leave you?
You've done so much for me.
Arvind.. - Who are you?
Who are you?

This mobile phone is Edwin's
who killed my brother.

You've spoken to him
for 23 times in last two days.
We are not her real parents.
We are drama artists.
This is our ID.

Your father, your mother,
and your brother.

Everyone are fake.
Who are you?
I will not kill you.
Nikhil.. who is he?
Who is Nikhil?
His number is in Edwin's mobile.

He gets many calls.
Who is Nikhil?
Tell me!
I knew it.
You'll get your men here.
Is he Nikhil!
Tell me!
Are you Nikhil?
Is he Nikhil?
So, you are Nikhil?
You are their boss, aren't you?
Tell me, is he your boss?
Tell me soon.

Tell me if he's your boss or not.
Or I'll kill him.
Yes.
You are lying to me again.

There's someone who made
my brother tell lies.

You bribed that
doctor with money.

You made Liyana
as my illusion.
I suffered a lot because of that.

When I have to
laugh and cry..

..when I have to love,
everything was planned by him.
He is not your boss.

Such man will not talk to
Edwin 30 times in a day.

Such mastermind would not
mingle with small time goons.

Only an intelligent person
can do such planning.
I will kill him.

One bullet inside and
his brains will blow.

It is my turn now!
- No!
Nab him!

Why are they after me
though Liya is not alive?
Why are they torturing me?
If Liyana is dead..

..then why is everyone
lying to me?
Liyana's death may be a charade.
This means, she can be alive.
The answer is inside the grave.

If she's dead, her corpse
should be inside.
But if there's corpse in it..
..then she's alive.
She is alive. Liyana is alive.
Liyana.

I knew she wouldn't
leave me and go.

I am coming to
meet you, Liyana!
Sir, actually..
Scoundrel!
Hey!
I don't know who you are.

I don't know
why you are after me.
You must have a reason.

I have only one reason
to kill you..
..and that reason is Liyana!

Open your eyes
and see my face.
Look at me!
Look!
Did you recognize me?
Look.
Look at me properly.
Did you recognize who I am?

Do you know your girlfriend
is in my custody?

If possible, save her.
Come on, try!
Sorry, sir.
Doctor says, if we give him..
..that treatment, he may die.
Doctor says, it is not right.
So, he stopped the treatment.
Will he die? - Yes, sir.
Okay.
He will die?
Let him die!
"Darling."
"Darling."
"Darling."
"Darling."
"I lost my sleep for you."

"I am awake and
I keep waiting for you."

"I'm restless.
O beloved, come to me."
"Welcome."

"Welcome."
- Payal.
My Payal.

Our caste and
religion was different.
So, we both decided to elope.
We didn't inform anyone.

But his brother and villagers
learnt about this.
No!

No! Leave me.
- They separated Vijay and Payal.
Leave him! No!

They thought I died and
took Payal with them.

According to the rules of Rampur
we made a mistake by falling in love.

So, they announced
death sentence for Payal.

Her family members had to
punish her.
They did the same.

Her brother poured poison
into her ears and killed her.

After this incident,
I left the village.

I decided to go somewhere
far from there.
So that I don't miss Payal..
..and don't cry all the time.

I came to Mumbai and did
all sorts of good and odd jobs.
I earned billions.
But in Payal's sorrow..

..I couldn't think of
marriage at the age of 50.

One day some students came to
interview me on industrial visit.

Seeing one girl,
I lost my mind.
Sir, why didn't you marry?
Payal.. My Payal.

The same face
and same smile.
Everything same.
Payal.. My Payal.

I thought God sent Payal
back to me.
I didn't want to lose her again.

This girl's father is a
mill worker in Pune.

He was thrown out of the village
for marrying out of caste.

At that time, caste became
enemy of my love.
Now my age..

No father would wish to marry
his daughter to an old man.
I was 29 years older to her.
So..

Father! - So, I killed
Liyana's parents.

I adopted her
without her knowledge.

I kept her in my house.
I sent her to a good college.

I waited for 4 years to
propose her.

But finally, 15 days before
she left..
I'm in love.

I want him dead!
Kill him!

Before my men could kill him,
they met with an accident.

They were brought
to my hospital.

She opened her eyes
after four days.
She first called out..
Arvind?
I'm sorry.
Doctor could only save you.
Liya..
Liyana!

I knew, she would try to
commit suicide.

So, I had to forcibly tell you
that Arvind is in coma.
Why did you lie to me?

I want to meet him.
Where is he? - Sir..
Get lost!

When she was scared,
I told her about Payal.

I told her that I waited her
for past four years.
Please.. I love him.

Love? You just know him
for 15 days, and you love him?
Forget him.

Once he is out of coma,
he too will forget you.
No! I trust him.
What love?
Is this love?
You call a small meeting as love?
I don't call this as love.
This is lust.

We give jobs to only beautiful
girls in our software company.

Only because of them
guys work with interest.

For a software engineer like
Arvind, girls are a toy to him.
To refresh the mind..
..beer and girls are equal.

You know something, if you
don't meet him for a month..

..you'll get a message from him,
'what's up? What's going on?'

When you don't meet him
for two months..

..he will be spending time
with a girl in the official party.

When you meet him after
three months..

..he will keep his hand
on your shoulder and say..

..'relax darling, so what?
This is common.'
So, I call this as lust.

He is not like that.
- Hey! I've been telling you..
..don't you understand!
Look at me.

I'm scared that you may
take a wrong step.
So, I kept  him alive.

But if you don't become mine,
I will not let you become his.
Nikhil!
No, please.
No..
Please.
Please, don't do this.
Please.
Arvind!
Arvind shouldn't die!
He gave me life.
Then you'll have to marry me.
Yes.
First his treatment.
I will marry you.
But not as Liya, as Payal.
But Arvind will be in my heart.

Arvind shouldn't be
there in Payal's heart.
By the way, you told me..

..that he would forget me
if he doesn't meet me for a month..

..in the third month, he'll be with
some other girl and say 'so what?'

If I go in front of him, he will not
look at me. You said so, right?

Not a month, I give
you one year's time..
..make him forget me.

Show me that he is
enjoying with someone else.
What if he changes?
I will forget him.
He will not change.
He will not forget me.
I will change him.

I will erase your thoughts
from his heart.
I bought some people.
I threatened some.

I forced him to think
that Liyana is dead.

I made him realize that
Liyana was a dream.
Liyana was my life, doctor.

I brought him close
to some other girl.

But still he
couldn't forget Liyana.

He found out that Liyana was alive.
- Liyana, I'm coming to meet you!
He will come.
Arvind will surely come.
He will come to take me.
Electromagnetic therapy.

I will weaken his brain
muscles and ruin him.
Either he will forget her forever..
..or he will die.
Do you remember your name?
Rupesh, tell me.

Is your name Sandeep?
Look at me.
Is your name Arvind?
Look, have you seen me earlier?
Doctor, one second.
Sir, doctor was successful.

He has forgotten
his past life. - Good.

You can marry madam
in front of him.

Liyana can never become
yours even though you kill me.
GPS.. It is not reading.
GPS.. It is not reading.
There are 11 satellite in view.
Turn right.
Turn right.
Destination reached.
Arvind?
Arvind!
What happened?
Arvind?
What happened, Arvind?
Arvind?
Arvind?
Arvind!
Arvind!
You cannot be my Payal.
No, you can't.
You can't be my Payal!
Arvind!
Silly girl, don't cry.
All this happened because of me.
Sorry.

Do you know, Arvind?
I knew, no matter what..
..you will surely come to take me.

You trust me so much?
- Yes.
Your power.

Liya, I don't have any
power in me. - Arvind.

You are telling me so that
I don't trouble you.
Sorry.

Liya.. - I will never trouble
you again.

But don't lie to me that
you don't have any power.
Okay?
